definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)

sentences.english: But he believed they would show in time for the next election.
sentences.chinese: 但是他相信在下屆選舉前結果會及時的呈現了。

sentences.english: Next Kortrijk will see without any doubt even bigger results.
sentences.chinese: 下屆世界客車博覽無疑將有更大的規模。

sentences.english: But he might also have forfeited his chance of a second term.
sentences.chinese: 不過他也有可能喪失下屆當選的機會。

sentences.english: The focus will shift to a game of who's who in the next administration.
sentences.chinese: 焦點將放在下屆特區政府的估領袖遊戲。

sentences.english: So what should the next president do?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，下屆總統該如何抉擇？

sentences.english: There will be no loosening up until after the next leadership change in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 直到2012年下屆領導人換屆前，不會有任何鬆懈。

sentences.english: We will report on progress at the next Health Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在下屆衛生大會上報告進展。

sentences.english: But don’t bet on that necessarily being at the next election.
sentences.chinese: 不過你可別急着下屆選舉在這個上面投注。

sentences.english: And so I don't think that Americans want hubris from their next President.
sentences.chinese: 所以我認爲美國人不想要一個傲慢的下屆總統。

sentences.english: What benefits can Cologne expect from holding the WCG?
sentences.chinese: 科隆市可以從舉辦下屆WCG中獲得什麼利益呢？

sentences.english: Ireland was originally scheduled for the next general election held in mid-2012.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭下屆大選原定於2012年中期舉行。

sentences.english: If the Workers' Party comes in at the next election a lot of industry will be state-owned.
sentences.chinese: 如果工人黨下屆上臺執政，許多工業都將收爲國有。

sentences.english: Both Mr Tsang and Mr Tang are tipped as forerunners in the race for the next chief executive.
sentences.chinese: 曾蔭權和唐英年都被視爲下屆特首的熱門人選。

sentences.english: This city has been selected as the site for the coming Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市被選爲下屆奧運會的會址。

sentences.english: The next government’s main job will be to sort all this out.
sentences.chinese: 下屆政府的首要任務便是將這些問題全部解決。

sentences.english: But such measures can come into force only if the next Congress passes new legislation.
sentences.chinese: 但這類措施只有經下屆國會通過新立法纔會生效。
